review: Example & Associates has been heaven sent when it came to assisting with my injury. I had previous legal representation that became unresponsive and difficult to work with. They also instructed me to stop my treatments. Out of frustration, I sought out Aaron Example and it was the best decision I made. He quickly took over my case and had me attend medical appointments to identify my injury and and treatment plan. Once that occurred, he went after the insurance company to get a settlement that would take care of all of my needs. I don't write a lot of reviews, but I standby Example and Associates. God forbid if another accident/injury occurs but I know Example would be my attorney.
